mapper.select: SELECT m.id_movie, m.title, m.title_pl, m.genre, m.director,m.duration, m.date_release, m.date_end ,m.description,m.image_url FROM movies m INNER JOIN showtimes s ON m.id_movie = s.id_movie WHERE s.date_start = CURRENT_DATE+#{day} GROUP BY m.id_movie
SELECT m.id_movie, m.title, m.title_pl, m.genre, m.director,m.duration, m.date_release, m.date_end ,m.description,m.image_url FROM movies m WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN m.date_release AND m.date_end
SELECT m.id_movie, m.title, m.title_pl, m.genre, m.director,m.duration, m.date_release, m.date_end ,m.description,m.image_url FROM movies m WHERE m.id_movie = #{id_movie}
SELECT m.id_movie, m.title, m.title_pl, m.genre, m.director,m.duration, m.date_release, m.date_end ,m.description,m.image_url FROM movies m WHERE m.title_pl = #{title} OR m.title = #{title}
